entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is described as someone who would guess that the house belongs to a rich, fussy old lady if he didn't know who lived there.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and experienced wizard. He has an injured hand and is slower than before due to age.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: A blunt and observant person who notices Dumbledore's injured hand and comments on it.

entities.name: horace
entities.description: Someone who is older than Harry and is mentioned in a conversation between Slughorn and Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Slughorn comments on Dumbledore's injured hand.
Dumbledore shows Harry his burned and blackened fingers, indicating that he was injured.
